column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

Virtue Diagnostics Singapore Pte. Ltd. is 100% invested as an overseas Research & Development center by Virtue diagnostics Suzhou Co., LTD. An innovative IVD company established in China in June 2019 and focusing on Pathogenic Microorganisms, Cancer, Maternal & Fetal Health, and Chronic Diseases. The company will adopt a collaborative innovation model, establish a complete industrial chain from innovative research and development to clinical trials, clinical applications, and large-scale industrialization, and serve the world's advanced diagnostic technologies and solutions to the China market. At present, the company has reserved a number of pipelines for research projects.

Achieve software design tasks for new products development and products upgrading according to related compliance requirements and company quality management standards

Responsibilities

  • Work in a multidisciplinary team for cutting-edge product development.
  • Develop high performance system for bio-medical applications.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to collect detailed software requirement.
  • Work with firmware engineers, system engineers and testers to achieve a comprehensive design and development
  • Develop test cases and conduct unit testing before integrate into system
  • Write and update product related documents

  • Experience in the whole software development cycle: collecting requirement, subsystem design, detailed design, unit implementation and validation
  • Exposure with Scrum methodology and continuous integration is preferred
  • Using GIT or other similar source control system
  • Be self-motived and learn new technologies and domain knowledge quickly

Interested candidates please email your detailed resume and indicate your current and expected salary.

529,computer research,/en/job/research-fellow-%5Bbbi%5D-imcb-9389433,9389433,Research Fellow [BBI] - IMCB,False,False,,,SGD,"Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR)",17-Mar-22,False,,30 days,T08GB0002C,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
﻿Job Description
The Translational Neuroscience programme of the Singapore Institute for Clinical Sciences (SICS) invites applications for the position of Research Fellow in the area of brain and mental health.  SICS is a leading institution for the Singaporean Health and Human Potential initiative that seeks to promote brain health across the population.  As part of the Smart Nation initiative, SICS and its partners are dedicated with developing research at the interface of mental health, digital technology and data science. SICS is dedicated to career development for all staff and to providing a stimulating intellectual environment with opportunities for experience and further training.  Moreover, SICS provides a unique research environment for analyses that consider genetic and environmental influences on brain development.
The successful candidate will play a key role in uncovering the genetic and environmental determinants of mental health problems in youth and developing novel treatments. The position emphasizes research activity across both local (e.g: the Growing Up in Singapore Towards healthy Outcomes) and international longitudinal birth cohorts, as well as interactions with ministerial agencies in the fields of health, education and social and family services.
The ideal candidate should have an interest in building on world-leading research targeting population mental health, with a track record of experience and training in biological data, data analyses and data mining.  The job responsibilities include the following:
  • Conduct original analyses of multidimensional, longitudinal data sets in collaboration with ASTAR researchers
  • Meet weekly with Reporting Officer/Principal Investigator and join weekly discussions with a group of post-doctorate researchers and PI’s
  • Interface and facilitate interactions with multi-disciplinary researchers, Clinical Operations, Data Management, Statistics, and Project Management.
  • Assist in the preparation of grant applications and grant process reports
  • Partner with scientists in computing and engineering to bring digital solutions into studies of adolescent mental health
  • Present findings both orally and in written form via presentations and publication in peer-reviewed journals
  • Collaborate with the community the Fellows and PIs across A*STAR.
  • Experience in advanced computational methods (e.g., machine learning) would be advantageous
  • Has a strong team focus, with the ability to work independently as well as in collaboration with a range of PI’s
  • Excellent interpersonal, written and oral communication skills
Qualification & Field of Study
  • PhD in Psychology, Neuroscience, Computer Science, or relevant field
Min. Years of Experience
  • 0-2 years of relevant experience
Other Requirements (e.g. Skills, Competencies)
  • Knowledge of statistical software - SPSS, Mplus, Stata, etc, and programming lanaguages, e.g. R, Python, etc, will be considered favorably
",[],Entry Level,,,Doctorate (PhD),,Full-Time,,"['Regular hours, Mondays - Fridays', 'Casual (e.g. T-shirts)']",https://careers.a-star.edu.sg/JobDetails.aspx?ID=UVUXsFHm3aZqMfTuBxF78Q%3d%3d,70000,Singapore,sg

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

Research Fellow (Electrical and Electronics Engineering/Computer Science/Computer Engineering)
A Research Fellow position is available in the School of Electrical Electronic Engineering.
Job Responsibilities
  • Conduct the research on the development of the decision-making function which performs optimal dispatch of distributed energy resources (DERs) which include stor batteries, renewable solar PV systems and standby diesel generators (reserve only) for participation in the reserve market, frequency regulation market and peer-to-peer energy trading among the buildings with demand side manment capabilities
  • Develop methodologies for forecasting load and solar PV output, for scheduling of DERs as well as for a P2P energy trading platform; design smart contracts for P2P energy trading; propose a cost-effective and scalable network architecture to support Ethereum; and introduce a novel incentive mechanism to promote P2P energy trading
Job Requirements
  • PhD in Electrical and Electronics Engineering or Computer Science/Engineering
  • Expert knowledge in power electronics converters and power systems especially in the design of distributed energy resources, forecasting and frequency regulation controller for electricity market participation
  • Hardware experience will aid in the execution of the project
  • Experience with energy stor systems, renewable energy resources, electric vehicles and/or OPAL-RT is highly recommended
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
  • Strong analytical and conceptual abilities
  • Able to work independently and in a team to realize the proposed works
  • Able to publish conference/journal papers and commit your time in the project, our project ends on 31 March 2022 and project extension is possible subject to the approval by the funding ncy
  • Able to present effectively the work accomplid to EMA and ESG representatives
We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

ComfortDelGro Corporation Limited (CDG) is one of the world’s largest land transport companies with a total fleet size of more than 40,000 buses, taxis and rental vehicles. Headquartered in Singapore, the CDG also has operations in China, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, Vietnam, and Malaysia. More information about CDG can be found at http://www.comfortdelgro.com","
Responsible for designing and developing AI/ML applications on the Company’s application.Responsible for collabrating with other engineers in the team to research, experiment, and build AL/ML models & algorithms by utilizing various of data sources to address complex business needs.
Responsibilities: 
  • Implement scalable and robust AI/ML systems computing on large volumes of datasets using a variety of open source and relevant technologies.
  • Implement and integrate system components for service orchestration, scheduling, job status monitoring, model performance monitoring, failure recovery, APIs, and any other components required for a robust and reliable Machine Learning system spanning on-premises and cloud environments.
  • Contribute towards artificial intelligence and machine learning, including (but not limited to) the development and testing of prototype software which implement state-of-the-art algorithms.
  • Design, develop, and deploy software solutions for a variety of exciting projects.
  • Prepare technical documentation as necessary.
  • Collaborate with team members and other Engineers for successful delivery of applications.
  • Write and automate unit, functional, integration and performance tests in a Continuous Integration environment.
  • Need to have good understanding and knowledge of AI / Machine Learning and how the adoption can help CDG achieve the desired outcomes. 
  • Need to have good understanding of development methodologies, testing practices, and tools in AI / Machine Learning.
Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Computer Science/Information Technology, Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent.
  • At least 5 year(s) of working experience with a software product company. Proven track records of developing AI/ML models for this position.
  • Proficiency in programming skill such as Python, AI/ML algorithms, JavaScript C# and strong in e in .NET Core, C# Web services, RESTFUL API, Database Management systems.
  • Knowledge on running AI/ML workloads on different cloud providers like AWS or Azure.
  • Strong knowledge on Kubernetes, Docker, GPU, TensorFlow, PyTorch or other Opensource AI/ML framework and libraries.
  • Understanding of Agile, SCRUM and Continuous Delivery
  • Self-directed, ability to work independently and research innovative solutions to technical and business problems.
  • Demonstrated strong communication skills to establish relationships across functional teams to achieve aligned goals.
  • Ability to effectively operate in a fast-paced, ambiguous, constantly evolving environment.
  • Preferably Managers specializing in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.
  • Full-Time position(s) available.

Research Fellow (Electrical/Power/Control System Engineering/Computer Science)
Institute of Catastrophe Risk Manment invites applications for the position of Research Fellow for a project funded by NRF, Singapore under the Future Resilient Systems-St II (FRS-II) programme.
Key Responsibilities
  • Conduct in-depth research on a few topics including                                                                                                        
  • the feasibility and limitations of existing devices applied in risk detection and situation awareness in power systems
  • risk detection and situation awareness in power systems with multi-source information or incomplete/inaccurate information
  • risk detection and situation awareness in distributed controlled power systems
  • scheme developments for situation awareness in power system recovery                                                           
  • Present research results as publications, reports
  • Develop simulation programs
  • Discussions and collaborations with industrial partners
  • Extensive collaborations with many team members working for the same programme
Job Requirements
  • PhD in electrical engineering, power engineering, control system engineering or computer science
  • Solid background knowledge and related research experiences in situation awareness and system resilience in cyber- systems, especially power systems
  • Smooth programming skills and oral/writing communication skills
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column3: Salesforce.com is the enterprise cloud computing company. Our portfolio of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) applications, including our award-winning customer relationship management (CRM), has revolutionized the ways that customers manage and share business information over the Internet. Salesforce.com has evolved from a startup founded by four people in a cramped San Francisco apartment ten years ago to a company described by Barron’s as ""the fastest growing business software company in the world"" and one of the top ""100 Best Companies to Work For."" According to Gartner, 25% of all software will be deployed via the cloud computing model by 2011. No matter how you slice it, the future of software is cloud computing. The company has completed another stellar quarter with record revenue of $394 Million, an Increase of 25% Year-Over-Year. Our total customers have grown to 82,400. As a result of this growth we are busy and are hiring aggressively in all areas of the business.

column1: <div>
<div>

column3: Salesforce.com and our global team of employees are transforming the way companies are run and careers are made. In just 10 years, salesforce.com has grown into a $1 billion business and captured more than half of the market for software-as-a-service CRM applications. All thanks to the hard work of 3,500+ employees at our San Francisco headquarters and throughout North America, Canada, Europe, Japan, and the larger Asia-Pacific region.

column1:
","

To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

About Futureforce University Recruiting

Our Futureforce University Recruiting program is dedicated to attracting, retaining and cultivating talent. Our interns and entry level candidates work on real projects that affect how our business runs, giving them the opportunity to make a tangible impact on the future of our company. With offices all over the world, our recruits have the chance to collaborate and connect with fellow employees on a global scale. We offer job shadowing, mentorship programs, talent development courses, and much more.

Job Category

Intern

Job Details

Salesforce Research Asia is looking for outstanding research interns. Ideal candidates have a strong background in one or more of the following fields:

  • Deep learning,
  • Machine learning,
  • Natural language processing,
  • Computer vision,
  • Reinforcement learning, or
  • Economics

Applied to, for example: text categorization, text summarization, information extraction, question answering, dialogue systems, machine translation, language and vision, image classification, object detection, economics, biomedical sciences, etc.

Candidates that have published in top-tier conferences or journals (e.g. NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, CVPR,) are preferred.

As a research intern, you will:

  • Work with a team of research scientists and engineers on a project that ideally leads to a submission to a top-tier conference
  • Learn about exciting research and applications outside your expertise
  • Focus on pure research that incorporates into your PhD focus area and contributes to the AI Community
  • Attend conferences with our researchers to showcase your accepted papers

Requirements:

  • PhD/MS candidate in a relevant research area
  • Excellent understanding of deep learning techniques, i.e., CNN, RNN, LSTM, GRU, attention models, and optimisation methods
  • Experience with one or more deep learning libraries and platforms, e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, Caffe, or Chainer
  • Strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, or reinforcement learning
  • Strong algorithmic problem solving skills
  • Programming experience in Python, Java, C/C++, Lua, or a similar language

This internship is a minimum of 12 weeks.

Candidates that have published in top-tier conferences or journals (e.g. NIPS, ICML, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, SIGKDD, PAMI, JMLR, TACL, IJCV) are preferred.

As a research intern, you will work with a team of research scientists and engineers on a project that ideally leads to a submission to a top-tier conference.

Accommodations

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.

Posting Statement

At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits.

Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce.com or Salesforce.org.

Salesforce welcomes all.

column2:
Join our team and help us transform Singapore’s future through research! RySense is a research organisation dedicated to understanding what Singaporeans think, feel and do. Harnessing our passion for research excellence, we take pride in delivering quality data and in-depth insights that empower decision-making and shape a better Singapore. Our commitment to robust methodologies, timely information, and incisive recommendations distinguishes us as a centre of expertise for social trends and public opinion. We welcome people with passion for building a better future for all through meaningful work, diverse ideas, and collaborative spirit. We believe in investing in the development of our people, so that we can grow together and achieve more in this place we call home. Visit RySense’s corporate website (www.RySense.sg) to discover more about us – and to find out how you can be part of this exciting journey!","

ABOUT RYSENSE LTD

RySense is a homegrown research organisation dedicated to understanding what Singaporeans think, feel and do. Harnessing our passion for research excellence, we take pride in delivering quality data and in-depth insights that empower decision-making and shape a better Singapore. Our commitment to robust methodologies, timely information, and incisive recommendations distinguishes us as a centre of expertise for social trends and public opinion.

We welcome people with passion for building a better future for all through meaningful work, diverse ideas, and collaborative spirit. We believe in investing in the development of our people, so that we can grow together and achieve more in this place we call home.

Visit RySense’s corporate website (www.RySense.sg) to discover more about us – and to find out how you can be part of this exciting journey!


JOB SUMMARY

We are looking for an experienced Database Developer to be part of our data modernization journey.

In this role, you will design, implement, and maintain the databases and data applications, ensuring that it meets operational requirements. As the custodian of our database application systems, you will be responsible for ensuring its security, reliability, and accuracy.  

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Develop new functionalities on existing database-driven applications.
  • Maintain existing codebase include migration of legacy applications and troubleshooting of bugs.
  • Responsible for both front-end and back-end web development.
  • Participate in the technical implementation of the project discussion, codes review and architecture optimisation.  
  • Support, maintenance, and documentation of software functionality including application changes.  
  • Ensure that non-functional requirements such as security, performance, maintainability, scalability, usability, and reliability are being considered when architecting a solution.  
  • Perform data mining and analysis, extract transform & load (ETL) operations, execute data queries, generate reports, and create dashboards.
  • Maintain database dictionaries, SOPs and other relevant documentation
  • Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned. 

REQUIREMENTS

  • Possess a Degree / Diploma in Computer Science or equivalent. 
  • Possess minimum 5 years’ experience developing database driven applications with HTML/5, CSS/3, Bootstrap/4, JQuery, PHP (Laravel framework), Apache/NGINX
  • Ability to write SQL queries including T-SQL, stored procedures, and design databases in MySQL. 
  • Knowledge of database administration and operations, extract transform & load (ETL) frameworks, data warehouse concepts and business intelligence (BI) solutions 
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skill 
  • Good communication and presentation skill 
  • Team player but also able to work independently 

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column1: 537,computer research,/en/job/research-engineer-%5Bmec%5D-simtech-9389579,9389579,"Research Engineer [MEC], SIMTech",False,False,,,SGD,"Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR)",17-Mar-22,False,,30 days,T08GB0002C,,,501 - 1000 Employees,,,"<div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
Job Description:
SIMTech is looking for a motivated, innovative quick learner with excellent interpersonal skills to join the Manufacturing Execution & Control (MEC) group. The scope of work includes:
  • To understand customer requirements and propose solutions with feasible scope and effort
  • Software development and testing for algorithms in data analytics, data acquisition and sensorisation, ETL of data models, statistical feature extraction
  • Software implementation and deployment
  • Customer technical support and troubleshooting
Job Requirements:
  • Bachelor's degree in the field of AI and data analytics, industrial systems engineering, operations research, computer science, computer engineering, mathematics and statistics, electrical engineering, or relevant discipline.
  • Ability to work independently to translate research ideas into solutions.
  • Strong skillset in C#, Java, SQL, Python/R, needed
  • Prior experience in manufacturing industry is a plus
  • Experienced in machine/PLC connectivity, sensorisation, OPC-UA and MQTT protocols is a plus
  • Able to deliver under tight schedule.
  • Good team player with both research and engineering ethics.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills.
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Job Description:
SIMTech is looking for a motivated, innovative quick learner with excellent interpersonal skills to join the Manufacturing Execution & Control (MEC) group. The scope of work includes:
  • To understand customer requirements and propose solutions with feasible scope and effort
  • Software development and testing for algorithms in data analytics, data acquisition and sensorisation, ETL of data models, statistical feature extraction
  • Software implementation and deployment
  • Customer technical support and troubleshooting
Job Requirements:
  • Bachelor's degree in the field of AI and data analytics, industrial systems engineering, operations research, computer science, computer engineering, mathematics and statistics, electrical engineering, or relevant discipline.
  • Ability to work independently to translate research ideas into solutions.
  • Strong skillset in C#, Java, SQL, Python/R, needed
  • Prior experience in manufacturing industry is a plus
  • Experienced in machine/PLC connectivity, sensorisation, OPC-UA and MQTT protocols is a plus
  • Able to deliver under tight schedule.
  • Good team player with both research and engineering ethics.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills.
The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

S-Lab for Advanced Intelligence invites applications for the position of Research Engineer.
Key Responsibilities (include but are not limited to):
  • Design, build, and maintain iOS/MacOS mobile applications/platforms
  • Specific duties include but are not limited to ensuring the quality and performance of the applications/platforms, identifying and fixing application bugs, maintaining the core code, and implementing updates to the application/platform
Job Requirements
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
  • Proven experience as an app developer
  • Proficient in Objective-C / Cocoa / Swift / C++
  • Knowledge of Apple’s development APIs (UIKit, CoreFoundation, Cocoa Touch) and iOS back-end services
  • Familiarity with essential tools (Xcode, Instruments)
  • Experience in writing testable and maintainable codebases
  • Excellent problem solving and debugging skills
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Experience in computer vision or machine learning is preferable
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

547,computer research,/en/job/2021-research-intern-salesforce-research-asia-%7C-salesforce-9404391,9404391,2021 Research Intern - Salesforce Research Asia | #Salesforce,False,False,,,SGD,Salesforce.com,22-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200410660N,,,2001 - 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column3: Salesforce.com is the enterprise cloud computing company. Our portfolio of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) applications, including our award-winning customer relationship management (CRM), has revolutionized the ways that customers manage and share business information over the Internet. Salesforce.com has evolved from a startup founded by four people in a cramped San Francisco apartment ten years ago to a company described by Barron’s as ""the fastest growing business software company in the world"" and one of the top ""100 Best Companies to Work For."" According to Gartner, 25% of all software will be deployed via the cloud computing model by 2011. No matter how you slice it, the future of software is cloud computing. The company has completed another stellar quarter with record revenue of $394 Million, an Increase of 25% Year-Over-Year. Our total customers have grown to 82,400. As a result of this growth we are busy and are hiring aggressively in all areas of the business.

column1: <div>
<div>

column3: Salesforce.com and our global team of employees are transforming the way companies are run and careers are made. In just 10 years, salesforce.com has grown into a $1 billion business and captured more than half of the market for software-as-a-service CRM applications. All thanks to the hard work of 3,500+ employees at our San Francisco headquarters and throughout North America, Canada, Europe, Japan, and the larger Asia-Pacific region.

column1:
","

To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

Our Futureforce University Recruiting program is dedicated to attracting, retaining and cultivating talent. Our interns and entry level candidates work on real projects that affect how our business runs, giving them the opportunity to make a tangible impact on the future of our company. With offices all over the world, our recruits have the chance to collaborate and connect with fellow employees on a global scale. We offer job shadowing, mentorship programs, talent development courses, and much more.

Job Category

Intern

Job Details

Job Description: 

Salesforce Research Asia is looking for outstanding research interns. Ideal candidates have a strong background in one or more of the following fields:

  • deep learning,
  • machine learning,
  • natural language processing,
  • computer vision,
  • reinforcement learning, or
  • economics

Applied to, for example: text categorization, text summarization, information extraction, question answering, dialogue systems, machine translation, language and vision, image classification, object detection, economics, biomedical sciences, etc.

Candidates that have published in top-tier conferences or journals (e.g. NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, CVPR,) are preferred.

As a research intern, you will:

  • Work with a team of research scientists and engineers on a project that ideally leads to a submission to a top-tier conference
  • Learn about exciting research and applications outside your expertise
  • Focus on pure research that incorporates into your PhD focus area and contributes to the AI Community
  • Attend conferences with our researchers to showcase your accepted papers

Requirements:

  • PhD/MS candidate in a relevant research area
  • Excellent understanding of deep learning techniques, i.e., CNN, RNN, LSTM, GRU, attention models, and optimization methods
  • Experience with one or more deep learning libraries and platforms, e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, Caffe, or Chainer
  • Strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, or reinforcement learning
  • Strong algorithmic problem solving skills
  • Programming experience in Python, Java, C/C++, Lua, or a similar language

This internship is a minimum of 12 weeks.

Candidates that have published in top-tier conferences or journals (e.g. NIPS, ICML, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, SIGKDD, PAMI, JMLR, TACL, IJCV) are preferred.

As a research intern, you will work with a team of research scientists and engineers on a project that ideally leads to a submission to a top-tier conference.

Requirements:

  • PhD/MS candidate in a relevant research area
  • Excellent understanding of deep learning techniques, i.e., CNN, RNN, LSTM, GRU, attention models, and optimization methods
  • Experience with one or more deep learning libraries and platforms, e.g. PyTorch, TensorFlow, Caffe, or Chainer
  • Strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, or reinforcement learning
  • Strong algorithmic problem solving skills
  • Programming experience in Python, Java, C/C++, Lua, or a similar language

This internship is a minimum of 12 weeks.

Accommodations

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.

Posting Statement

At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits.

Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce.com and Salesforce.org will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesfore.com or Salesforce.org.

Salesforce welcomes all.

Project Officer (Computer Science/Engineering/Electronic Engineering)
School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE) invites applications for the position of Project Officer.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Research on the below areas
    • Different deep-learning and machine learning based domain-specific acceleration and nanophotonic computing design
    • Optical or electronic architecture-level design, device-level design and domain-specific acceleration
  • Implement these deep-learning based algorithms and perform experiments/evaluation for domain-specific acceleration nanophotonic computing systems
  • Collaborate with other team member(s) for more efficient outcome delivery
  • Perform administrative works assigned by the PI to ensure the smoothness of the project.
Job Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s degree or above in Computer Science/Engineering or Electronic Engineering at a top-tier university
  • Experience in machine learning, deep learning, nanophotonic design, nanophotonic devices, design automation, embedded systems, real-time systems, computer architecture, computer-aided design, etc or related fields
  • Entry level candidates are welcome to apply
  • Experienced applicants are preferred
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column2: The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that spearheads economic oriented research to advance scientific discovery and develop innovative technology. Through open innovation, we collaborate with our partners in both the public and private sectors to benefit society.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2: As a Science and Technology Organisation, A*STAR bridges the gap between academia and industry. Our research creates economic growth and jobs for Singapore, and enhances lives by contributing to societal benefits such as improving outcomes in healthcare, urban living, and sustainability.

column1: <div style=""text-align:justify"">

column2:
We play a key role in nurturing and developing a diversity of talent and leaders in our Agency and 19 biomedical sciences and physical sciences research institutes, the wider research community and industry.","
ABOUT SERC
Science and Engineering Research Council (SERC) of A*STAR promotes public sector research and development in the physical sciences and engineering. At SERC, we:  
  • Support world-class research in A*STAR institutes in a wide range of fields including communications, AI & data science, cybersecurity, modelling and simulations, materials, chemicals, microelectronics, manufacturing technologies and metrology;  
  • Plan and promote research in strategic areas to create knowledge and innovation that drive the development of knowledge-intensive industries;   
  • Engage an extensive network of industry partners via various programmes to facilitate a seamless flow of technologies from conception to commercialisation.  
JOB DESCRIPTION
  • A Senior Officer / Assistant Head in Infocomm Cluster of SERC is required to support the strategising and managing of A*STARs R&D initiatives in digital technologies, such as: 
  • AI and Data Science 
  • Communications (eg. 5G) and Internet-of-Things
  • Digital trust technologies (e.g. privacy preservation and distributed ledger technologies) 
  • Cybersecurity Digital Twinning and Modelling & Simulations 
  • Quantum Computing The officer will be part of a dynamic Infocomm Cluster team which shapes public sector research and innovation to deliver economic and societal outcomes for Singapore through:
  • Strategic planning, coordination, and collaborations in digital technology R&D with Ministries & Public Agencies partners, research Institutes, Institutes of Higher Learning, and industry sectors  
  • Long-term R&D planning and stakeholder engagements that shape and contribute directly to the national R&D agenda  
  • Technology foresighting and masterplanning to optimise R&D investment portfolio and ensure alignment with national priorities   R&D programme strategy development and design, which entails convening relevant public agencies, enterprises, and research entities (within A*STAR and from Institutes of Higher Learning) into collaboration programmes and securing necessary management support and resources for programme initiation  R&D programme execution and management, including planning for subsequent technology translation and commercialisation  
  • Strategic development and reviews of digital technology capabilities in A*STAR Research Institutes   ??         Research proposals evaluation, project reviews and grant management
JOB REQUIREMENTS
  • Background in Engineering, IT or Computer Science, with preferably 2 or more years of working experience in these fields   
  • Ability to think strategically and analyse issues from different angles   
  • Knowledge in a broad range of digital technologies, digital industry, their trends, challenges, and potentials   
  • Passion in shaping research and innovation in digital technologies to bring about economic and societal outcomes for Singapore   
  • Proactive learning attitude, attention to details and results-oriented 
  • Comfortable with delivering outcomes in complex environment within challenging timelines

column1: 550,computer research,/en/job/research-engineer-computer-science-r00006725-immediate-9379816,9379816,Research Engineer (Computer Science) - R00006725 #Immediate,False,False,,,SGD,Nanyang Technological University,14-Mar-22,False,,30 days,200604393R,,,More than 5000 Employees,,,"<div>

column4: About Nanyang Technological University, Singapore

A research-intensive public university, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore (NTU Singapore) has 33,000 undergraduate and postgraduate students in the Engineering, Business, Science, Humanities, Arts, & Social Sciences, and Graduate colleges. It also has a medical school, the Lee Kong Chian School of Medicine, established jointly with Imperial College London.

NTU is also home to world-class autonomous institutes – the National Institute of Education, S Rajaratnam School of International Studies, Earth Observatory of Singapore, and Singapore Centre for Environmental Life Sciences Engineering – and various leading research centres such as the Nanyang Environment & Water Research Institute (NEWRI) and Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N).

Ranked amongst the world’s top universities by QS, NTU has also been named the world’s top young university for the past seven years. The University’s main campus is frequently listed among the Top 15 most beautiful university campuses in the world and has 57 Green Mark-certified (equivalent to LEED-certified) buildings, of which 95% are certified Green Mark Platinum. Apart from its main campus, NTU also has a campus in Novena, Singapore’s healthcare district.

Under the NTU Smart Campus vision, the University harnesses the power of digital technology and tech-enabled solutions to support better learning and living experiences, the discovery of new knowledge, and the sustainability of resources.

  • Familiarity with essential tools (Xcode, Instruments)
  • Experience in writing testable and maintainable codebases
  • Excellent problem solving and debugging skills
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills
  • Experience in computer vision or machine learning is preferable
